tooltip: Select Sekaia, Fairy of Winds, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Sekaia focuses on improving the speed of Fairies in various ways.
Allows you to summon Sekaia, a Mage hero that summons the winds.
Hovering unit that attacks groups of enemies with Melee Splash Damage.
Time to change Seasons reduced by 10%.
Improves the movement speed of all Fairy units.
